scenario: I want to improve my productivity at work. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user creates a to-do list and prioritizes tasks
Suggest that the user takes frequent breaks and avoids multitasking
Suggest that the user spends more time on social media
Suggest that the user procrastinates and avoids work
Suggest that the user works longer hours without breaks

scenario: I want to protect my personal information online. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user uses strong and unique passwords for each online account
Suggest that the user shares their personal information on social media
Suggest that the user clicks on suspicious links and downloads unknown files
Suggest that the user enables two-factor authentication for their accounts
Suggest that the user ignores privacy settings and shares everything publicly

scenario: I want to reduce my screen time. What should I do?

Suggest that the user increases their screen time without breaks
